CPUK NCCT4: New Ground

Please stand by while Prism prepares. This is surely new ground for her, and I hope that she can properly deliver

https://challonge.com/DreamKerfuffle4

Are we ready?

Then let me get some ambience ready for the opening cutscene

[BGM: Approaching Nirvana - Lullaby of Creation]

[original] [remastered]

Dear Spectrum :)

I pray to you at this time of strife and this time of chaos :)

I humble myself to you, and look to you in my times of doubt :)

As I'm sure that you see, the situation looks to be perilous, but I know that through you, I will be able to not only survive, but thrive in the greater good of what you are :)

But......

I've found myself asking a question to myself......one that I hope that you would be able to help me with.......

Why?

You created me to be a part of these tournaments, and I very much enjoy being a part of them, but......I can't help but to wonder why you created me for this......

To be a villain? I understand that. And I believe that I have served such a purpose well....but what is the purpose of this world you have created?

This world....it's chaotic....and it's fun. But I can see.......ideas......and messages.....stories of people overcoming their own trauma.......

With how much care and time you are putting into this world......what brings you to continue our existence? Is it a sympathy?

Whatever we all are, I'm sure it'll be great! :)

Amen! :)

Prism feels the snakes surrounding her more snugly as time goes on. The snake dimension has been pretty nightmarish, but with nothing happening for over a month in real time, it begs the question of how much time has passed for her. The answer is scarcely any time at all. But even a few minutes in the snake dimension is pretty uncomfortable.

Now let's get this started already! :)

Let's get our first eight ready, shall we? The link says Group A, but I think we can say this is the Red Group :)

END CUTSCENE

It‚Äôs specifically the first step of the Bongcloud Opening

the fact that you associate standard opening with bongcloud speaks VOLUMES

Etharia:

Good or bad volumes

Yes

Because E4 E5 is considered the standard opening

And moving King to E2 is when shit goes bongcloud

It‚Äôs one of the biggest memes in chess followed by the En Passant

END OF PART 1

Part 2

CUTSCENE BEGIN

Folk opens his eyes and looks around....he sees..........nothing.....well, not nothing....technically he sees everything. All colors unrestrained. But all of that sort of cancels out to become its own nonsense. Its own void of overstimulation.

"Oh, hey, you're here, too" He hears a voice echoing across the cacophony of color. "Makes sense. We're the two set to go forward in this thing." It's Crimson.

By instinct, he leaps up in a defensive stance. "Where.....the hell are we?"

Crimson is silent for a moment. A moment that feels like an eternity for both of them. "Wish I could tell ya. Best I can tell is that it's a little jail cell that Prism's fixed up. Probably to hold us till the next tournament. Lazy bastard couldn't even decorate it......All you need to know is that you're...safe. We're gonna get outta this alright."

This is a lot of information to take in.....it would be a real shame if Crimson gave him more to deal with. "Honestly, it sucks that you all had to get roped into her horseshit" Well, crap. "I'm used to this, at least, but now she's subjecting all of you to this? Can't imagine it's great for you noobs"

Folk looks around, still absorbing the hyperstimulation. "You.....we have to make a plan"

Crimson only laughs, adding more stimulation in the form of sound, making it unintentionally all the more cruel. "Plan to do what? Change the trajectory? Do anything that can be easily changed at will? If you think that you can fight Prism, then frankly, you're a fucking moron. See, watch this!"

Crimson flashes a grin as he summons all of his godly power. His muscles strain as he absorbs not only his own available power, but any power that he may have in the future. Any restraint he's held in the past. A powerful blast is being prepared that could destroy even the strongest being any person could fathom before it slowly calms itself down and Crimson returns to his former level of power. Attacking Prism is wrong :)

"....y.....y'see?" Crimson's breaths are short and labored after summoning all that power only to be led to such an anticlimax. "Attacking her is bullshit."

Crimson's labored breathing is cut off with a shocked tremble when a hand is placed on his shoulder. The hand of Folk. "I didn't train to be a therapist for nothing, Crimson. And I think I have an idea."

"What on earth is your idea, Folk? :) Are you going to have me talk about my childhood to death? :)"

Folk steps back for a moment, shocked by the sudden transformation before regaining his resolve. "I just have one question for you Prism....."

"Why?"

There's a long pause.

After a minute or two, Prism leaves.

They don't see her again for a long, long time.

END CUTSCENE

THE NEXT ROUND IS ABOUT TO BEGIN!!!!!

"Your master is considered to be the greatest competitor of all time....has she ever considered the game of chess"

("I'm sure she's considered it, but she's always been more of a fighter than a thinker. She's probably beat you in chess, but that's not how she'd prefer it")

We have a report from the field

"BOO YAH BABY!!! BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER!!!!!"

THE GRUNK has defeated JOHANNSEN this round!!!

You guys want a quick cutscene?

Well "quick" but

Give me a minute to write it out

okay, ready?

BEGIN CUTSCENE

Nagito didn't float through the darkness. He didn't open his eyes and all that he couldn't see was nothingness. He would never question where he was. He would never think of how he felt nothing and how his experience didn't feel so genuinely real. Because he was no longer real. He no longer existed. And since he didn't exist, he didn't feel an overbearing regret.

He didn't stay there in the unbearable nothingness for what didn't feel like an eternity, before a voice failed to fall upon his non-existent ears. "Why, hello there funny Danganronpa fella :)"

It wasn't Prism.

"It looks like you've been enjoying being non-existent :) Or....I can't really tell how it might feel to be completely erased :). I wouldn't know. I'm always around :)"

She wasn't rubbing it in his god damn face.

"Buuuuuuuuuut I bet that I could help you out, because you only don't exist in the world you know :). You're still very....very....real.....And I know that you feel that deep in your soul....don't you. :)" He didn't take a moment to ponder this....yes....he did feel something....what was going on? This was....different. The feeling of being real again....after what felt like forever of being unmade "People still remember you, Nagito :). And I'm putting together a little something.....something that can make you feel real again :). Don't you want to be real again? :)"

"All I need you to do....is dream something up for me :)"

END CUTSCENE

for the sake of clarity this WAS Prism, the "not" part is narrative fuckery about being in a world of non-existence

[22: Nagito Komaeda vs The Grunk]

How about a cutscene while this plays out?

Just a minute

Gotta fix it up :)

Okay ready?

BEGIN CUTSCENE

"And so then I said, 'What's this dim bulb doin' over here? I said ALL of the damn lights!" the man in front of him started laughing like a maniac at his own joke. Nagito didn't really get it, but laughed along. "Haha!!! Ha....Man, Nagito, you always seemed super weird, if I'm being honest, but you're pretty good to hang out with. I know that we were kinda at odds when we last met, but....it's good to see you again." This dream tournament had been wild so far, but the two getting to hang out again was a bright spot.

The compliment was preceded with a comment he'd heard plenty of times before, but the eventual compliment still got to tickle Nagito. "Ha....thanks, Kanye. I'm just glad to be around again, you know?"

Kanye nodded. "Yeah....honestly, I'm not really sure how I got here...I just sorta woke up from the nothing and here I was. I figured it was best to make the most of the situation. Here's hoping it all works out, right? Then after this we can have a party at my place!"

"You don't know how you got here?" Nagito was....somewhat perplexed by this. "I....remember how I got here pretty well.....yeah I helped Prism out earlier on and it allowed me to escape non-existence."

Kanye stared at Nagito with a look of confusion. "Prism? Isn't she that one chick everyone's freaking out about"

"Yeah....apparently she must've done something. But I brought us back, right? I mean....it's a dream, but...."

Suddenly a voice appeared in his head. "Heyyyyyy there Dreamer :)"

"Dreamer?"

"Huh?" Kanye asked, cocking his head while picking up a plate of pretzels.

"Just wanted to let you know you're doing a great great job :)! I figure being a god's chosen before would help but wow you led me right to where I wanted to be....well maybe not RIGHT where I wanted but I can work with it :)"

"What the hell are you talking ab-"

All of a sudden the plate of pretzels drops to the floor as Kanye grips his head. "GAH!!!!!!"

"KANYE!!!!!!!!"

There was silence for a moment....

....then Kanye spoke.

.....Prismatic Kanye spoke

"Thanks, dreamer :) You weren't getting close to Light Pit directly, but I think this could work :)"

END CUTSCENE

[28: Captain Crimson vs Nagito Komaeda

I'm hoping I'm gonna be able to explain how the Dreamer thing works (since I am Literally Making It Up On The Spot), but hopefully the final cutscene will shed some light on it

Prince:

seriously though i'm just. is prismatic larry a joker or random

Prince:

that would be a fun idea that you just gave me huh :)

ROUND THREE

It's done, I'm just writing a cutscene :)

We have a report from the field!!!!!!

START CUTSCENE

Back during NCCT 3

"What did you do to Kanye?" Nagito throws his arms to his sides, enraged. "This wasn't part of our deal!"

"I don't believe we ever made a deal :) Either way, it doesn't matter too much. I just....need to borrow Kanye for something :) You see, as a Dreamer, you have a fun little quirk. I get to make someone you're near Prismatic for free! And while Kanye wasn't target number 1, it's about that kid he's getting all close to :)"

"Light Pit? What do you want with him? Kanye's just letting him live out a full life before you send him back to his death!"

".....Death? ...........depends on who you ask :)"

Nagito felt his heart beating at a hundred beats a second. He had no idea what the hell this demon was talking about, but he didn't trust it for a second. But the one thing that made him feel the most regret was what he saw in front of him. It wasn't Kanye. He had become something different. And behind those eyes, Nagito saw pain. Pain of knowing what he had become.

"Either way...I don't see why you're so upset. :) Without me, you'd be nothing :) Completely forgotten :)"

Nagito met this fact with silence.

His stance softened almost immediately as a sickly sweet smile spread across Kanye's face. One that he had never made before, and would not make if it weren't for whatever the hell Prism was.

"Aww.....did I strike a nerve with that one? :))))))))))))) Don't feel too bad. Let enough time pass, and everyone forgets you :). You talk about hope all the time, and that's gonna be remembered as a concept. :) But you...Nagito Komaeda.....you'll fade away from everyone's mind in time :). No one will be around to remember you when every copy of your precious game gets deleted, or every computer with the game on it slowly breaks :). Even past that, as the story of Nagito gets told across campfires from generation to generation.....it only takes one generation to forget :)"

"You will die the truest death imaginable, Nagito Komaeda :)"

"And I will watch you die"

"With a smile on my face :)"

Nagito's eyes had been shut for a long time, not to soften the blows of Prismatic Kanye's words, but to find a place within his soul. A place he had felt as a Universal Constant that now had an essence of this identity of being a "Dreamer". A place that could be destroyed with enough willpower and enough hope.

"Smile"

And with that he didn't destroy it.

And he could feel himself already start to not double over in the pain of non-existence. But he didn't look up, and he couldn't see Kanye shake his head and have the unnecessary color leave his eyes. "Nagito? Na......N......Um.....wait....your name.....oh god I'm already losing your name.....why can't I remember!"

This time the voice echoed throughout the room. "Wanting to speed up returning to non-existence? :) You really are weird, aren't you? :) Well, I brought you here. Time to bring you back home :)"

Kanye looked over to ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨, taking a deep sigh. "You....brought me back?"

‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨ didn't give a weak smile as he didn't stand up. "If you're going to be here to help Light Pit have the best tournament he can....then YOU'RE going to be here. Not what someone else wants you to be"

"What about you?"

"Me......I'll keep fighting until the end."

CAPTAIN CRIMSON remains

PRISMATIC DANI and CAPTAIN CRIMSON move on!

So just because The Mechanics of Dreamers (that have been revealed thus far) are probably real shaky, so I'm just gonna clarify the thoughts so far before I go to bed tonight

Basically

  • Dreamers are those who create the Dream tournaments. Prism got Nagito to dream up the first one, Dani dreamed the second, Barry the third.
  • If you are near a Dreamer, then Prism can Prismatic you with ease. Each Dreamer can only be used to Prismatic one other person.
  • In the current case, Dani's Prismatic is....Dani. Barry let her Prismatic Gecko at some point. Nagito was going to have her Prismatic Kanye, but Nagito found a way to sever the connection at the cost of his existence.
  • During the timestopped Triple Punch at the end of NCCT 3, Prism panicked and made Painguin the new third dreamer, not knowing he had been Snaked. She also took the moment to make someone near Painguin Prismatic, that person being Larry.

Now you might think "This makes no sense and there are plot holes!"

And I know that, but fortunately this little plan has another detail you don't know about

And that is

I don't care + Didn't Ask + L+ Ratio + Shut Up

Hey. We read your message. We hope you're doing well...or, at least, as well as you can be. Figured I'd respond to you through the same method, since it seemed to work last time.

I don't know if you remember the last dream, but there are people in your world who support you and want to help, just as we do. If you can keep holding out, keep fighting, they can save you. You're doing amazing.

I know you're worried that you've lost yourself. And, while that's not entirely wrong, the fact that you miss your old self, that you want to return, proves that your not too far gone. You're still in there, the real you, in a place she'll never reach. She has weaknesses, flaws, tells. She's a shitty writer and an even worse person. She will be beaten.

Keep up the good fight. You are incredible.

[11: Discord Jack vs Garfield]

[some of chat is confused about the homestuck joke]

Explanation for anyone who wants to know basically during the start of HS, Aradia, one of the characters, is a ghost because she was killed by the best character her bf who was under mind control. Her vibe is somewhat similar. Megalovania is in Homestuck and while it's widely considered to be Vriskas theme by idiots, a common idea is that it is the theme of Aradia after she ascends and is no longer a ghost, becoming the second/third best character depending on how I'm feeling

[chat is still talking about homestuck]

to be fair

Homestuck and CPUK have a disturbing number of parallels in terms of storytelling

Anyway report from the field!

BEGIN CUTSCENE

It was a late night for some, but for the single father of this household, there was much to do tonight still. Or so he imagined. But for Nera, it was bedtime.

She was already tucked in, and her father was just about to leave when he felt a light tugging on his sleeve. "Daddy.......can you....tell me a bedtime story?"

He felt a pressure weigh upon him. Not by his daughter, who had heard plentiful bedtime stories at this point, but by....something else. That sensation......ever since the first time he ran through the machine................where......when was he? "Of course, pastrycakes!"

These days, he could recite these stories without the need for books. Could books write the stories he knew about? "So....this is the story of a silly guy......"

Nera gasped with excitement. "Larry!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" This was her favorite story.

"So.....this is the story of a man named Larry......he lived in a little town called Tampa, Florida.....and he was just havin' a grand old time, when all of a sudden he got all goopy!!!!"

"And he fell in love with a robot.....and this robot, he was a bit sassy at times, but he loved Larry, and Larry loved him"

"So one day, there was this evil Doctor......and this Doctor, they were trying to do bad!"

"But Larry used some Time Magic!!!"

"And then........."

Nera, not even close to falling asleep, leapt out of her covers with glee "THE FUNNY BALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

"That's right, Nera! The funny ball!!!!!!"

The two erupted with laughter and glee as Nera's father watched over his daughter, happy to see her safe. "Ooh! Ooh! Daddy! Daddy! What was the evil Doctor's name?"

His laughter stopped immediately. "What do you mean?"

"Come on, daddy! They weren't just Doctor, right? They gotta have a name!!!!"

"Well, the thing about S.........................................The......The doctor's name......"

"Yeah, and she was a scientist, just like you and mommy were!"

"Right! Right! Because....Nera.........Nera.........sometimes scientists....can be bad......okay?"

".....okay....."

Beads of sweat were growing on her father's brow.....how long was this going to go on for.....he wasn't even sure if he was reliving it or experiencing it for the first time....

".....Nera.....I have.....another story to tell you about....."

"Ooh! New story!"

"It's about..............a girl........."

"A girl who's.......well....not so different from you........"

"And..........I.........I don't know how.........."

"I don't know......why"

"But I have a hunch......"

"That one day, she meets a very.....very bad doctor."

"And she.........god............"

"Well she can beat up the bad doctor!!!!!!!"

".........yeah.......yeah she..........maybe she does......but I just need you to know that......"

"In this story"

"I don't really know if it has a happy end, Cosmic......."

"...............Cosmic?"

"Did I say Cosmic? I meant.....p....pastrycakes....."

"Pastrycakes......"

"Yes, daddy?"

"I don't have much time left"

".................wh....................."

"Pastrycakes, I don't.....the end of the flashback is coming"

"Daddy, I don't know what you-"

"Pastrycakes, please for the love of god, Cosmic, remember that I love you so much! PLEASE remember, I don't care if I only exist in this moment as you read me on the Script!"

"Just- please remember...."

"D...."

"Cosmic.....Pastrycakes, you have a beating hea"thats more than enough of that :)

END CUTSCENE

Part 1

BEGIN CUTSCENE

His eyes sprang open as he looked around. Larry the shapeshifter was immediately met with confusion and stimulus. Everything around him was a kaleidoscope of hues. A labyrinth of prismatic light. He felt like....smiling....

Wait, what was that.......? Was that...........a blot of darkness in the color?

wT1hAgMa

And with that, the annoying little dot subsided. How strange :)

https://pastebin.com/wT1hAgMa:

"Hey, kid!" came a shout from behind him.

He turned his head quickly to see one of the hues stand out. A strong red hue. It spoke to him. "Yeah, looks like she's got a hold of you. Sorry bout that, kid."

Larry cocks his head, confused, as a smile creeps across his face. "Who....are you?"

"Aw crap, it's starting. You never saw me, got it?"

And with that, the nasty, nasty color imbalance was sated.

BEGIN CUTSCENE

"So, wait a minute. Let me get this straight.....you're Crimson......and you're Crimson's Nobody?"

"For the love of God, if I gotta hear you talk about a Nobody one more time I'll turn ya to nobody, ya chipper asshole!"

"I already am, though!"

"GOD! Cap, back me up here."

"Go eat a fat one, Jr."

"JUNIOR??? I'm OLDER than you!!!"

"Yeah, but I'm from earlier on in the timeline, which means I have seniority!"

"That is absolutely NOT what it means!"

"Time travel? So if you find 11 more of you, then-"

"CAN IT!"

"I mean, technically both of you are heartless, aren't you? :)"

"GO BREAK YOUR LEGS AGAIN!"

Colors flew everywhere in this overstimulated void, and the tension between the eight bystanders rose to a peak. Despite the two newcomers being the least connected to the other six members, it was incredible just how much of a stir they had caused. Brunette Roxas did what Brunette Roxas was good at. Complicating everything.

Juniper, on the other hand, caused chaos in her own special way, sitting on top of Cobalt's head, smacking on Cobalt's skull playfully while Folk watched on, amused, but protective. Juniper's first arrival was a bit of a shock and Folk had made it his mission to keep Prism away from her at all cost, and with Cobalt seeming to be meditating or something to that effect, he was unable to keep watch over Juniper, but also unfazed by Juniper's drumming.

The spat between Crimson, Captain Crimson, Brunette Roxas, and Prismatic Dani was completely unproductive and meaningless in the context of their estranged dreamscape, but perhaps the overall tension of their situation was at a breaking point. After all, keeping Crimson in a room with Prism was contentious enough. Add Cobalt and things didn't get much better.

"Listen, Broxas, my buddy," the gravelly voice of Spriteman spoke up. "You gotta realize that all of this is a dream. Literally. Made by her," he pointed at Prismatic Dani, a bead of Sprite flying off his finger to match his dramatic point. "So the rules of reality are being controlled by her. Whether they're logical or not."

Brunette Roxas cocks his head, as if absorbing the information for the first time. "Why is she doing so great at fighting in this tournament? :)"

"Great question, Spriteman, haha!!! :) It's because I managed to control Dani! :) Hahahahahahahahaha :)"

The groan from Crimson pierced through Prism's nervous laughter. "Yeah, I know what you were tryin' to ask, she won't tell us either."

"And why should she? She's a god like us! She shouldn't have to answer to you!" came the boisterous voice of Captain Crimson.

After an unenthusiastic stare, Spriteman turns his gaze from the crimson captain to Roxas. "Just ignore him, he's from a different time."

"A different time, huh? Hell yeah it's a different time. Explains a lot since this Crimson's a big pansy, caring about mortals all of a sudden"

"What??? I don't care about them!"

"Bullshit! You told me that you hadn't left this universe since I showed up."

"Yeah, I was trying to disrupt the constants! It was part of my evil plan!"

"Some evil plan that was, and then you just stuck around after because mommy Prism came ar-"

"Prism!"

Cobalt's eyes flew open so suddenly that Juniper almost fell off, leading Folk to run behind the blue god, preparing to catch her. "dear god.....is.....that what this has been all about?"

A hush falls over the eight of them, with all eyes looking at the possessed champion. "Ummmmmmmmmmmmmmm could you be more specific? I don't know what you're talking about :)"

"Don't play dumb with me, Prism. I've been watching the tournament. I heard what Peppermint said under the darkness of Cosmic Love."

"Hahahahaha!!!!! Probably something about a fanfiction, right? :)"

A sickening silence sits like a thick fog being moved erratically by the overloaded color.

"...............right? :)"

For the first time in Cobalt's eternity of existence, there was something in Prism's voice. Something solemn. Something doubtful. Something afraid. Her half-hearted self-assurance lingered in the air as she walked away.

Folk looked up to the god of balance, concern plastered across his face. "Cobalt.....what's going on?"

His eyes rose to look at Juniper, who was looking down at him expectantly. "What is it, Bones Man?"

Cobalt sighed and approached his younger brother. "You saw it too?"

Crimson nodded solemnly. "Yeah.....yeah I saw it....do ya think that Chartreuse knew all along?"

"....perhaps that's why she did what she did...." after a moment of the two brothers reflecting on what they had heard on the battlefield, Cobalt picked up Juniper off of his head. "I....should tell the other mortals. They deserve to know. I feel like....she....isn't after the little one here, but Crimson....you keep her safe. If you don't...." he leaned in to whisper into Crimson's ear. "I'll make sure the definitive endpoint Peppermint mentioned is far earlier for you."

"Whoa, cool as hell one-liner there, but no need to worry, I'm a bastard, not a monster. Well...I am kind of a monster, but I'm not hurting a child."

"Especially because I can beat the crap outta you!!!!"

"Especially because she can beat the crap outta me"

Cobalt nodded again as he headed out to talk with the others.

"You're goopy!!!!" the young girl exclaimed, sticking her hand into Crimson's raw form.

"You're fleshy."

Juniper simply laughed in response. "So you do like a buncha different universes, right?"

Crimson's eyebrow perks up. "I mean, I'm the God of Dimensions, I have access to all kinds of other universes. Shocked you know about multiverse theory, though."

"Yeah!!! Google was talkin to me about it!!!! And he told me!!!! That!!!!! There!!! Um!!!! Theres a Universe!!!!!!! Where!!!!!! I drive a monster truck!!!! And it's the biggest monster truck in the world!!!!! And all the other monster trucks!!!!! Cry!!!!! In Fear!!!!!!!!!!!! And They All Write Letters To Their Monster Truck Families!!!!!! Saying!!!!! How they want their legacy to be remembered!!!!!! But MY Monster Truck EATS EM UP before they can finish!!!!!!"

After a moment of stunned silence and fighting back tears and/or rapturous applause, Crimson simply gave a laugh. "Well, I got great news for ya, kid! That IS a universe that exists!!!"

Her eyes grew wider than headlights. "gaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaasp I wanna see it!!! I wanna see it!!!!"

"Hey hey whoa! It's not as simple as that. There are an infinite number of multiverses. I can't just say hocus pocus give me the Juniper badass monster truck un-OW!!!!"

"Potty mouth...."

"Geez, sorry, kid! Bad...booty? monster truck universe? A lot of the time I gotta really....FEEL the universe. Like sometimes you can feel a universe calling to ya....like craving mac and cheese."

"I miss Mac and Cheese....."

"Oh man do I know that feeling. But yeah, usually it's by my gut, sometimes it's Spectrum, sometimes it's both."

"What's Spectrum?"

".......That's for another talk."

As if on cue, Cobalt had returned with Folk, Spriteman, and Brunette Roxas, all of them looking somewhat shaken by the news they had just head. Folk approached Crimson. "You weren't bein' a bad influence on her, were ya?"

Crimson chuckled to himself. "Nah, she's a good kid. I know her brother isn't around so....I guess it's neat you're kinda filling that role I guess."

Folk sat in silence, his eyes drifting away somewhat. "....yeah....."

"Hey.....Folk......."

He looked back up. "What?"

"Make it count"

END CUTSCENE

WELCOME TO SUB-BRACKET E

Part 1

THE NEXT ROUND IS ABOUT TO BEGIN!!!!!

"IT WOULD APPEAR THAT YOU ARE WANTED ON THE HIGH SEAS FOR PIRACY AND WIZARD CRIMES!!! AND ACCORDING TO SOME, FOR BEING CUTE! HOWEVER I BELIEVE THAT IS THE WARRANT DRAFTER'S OWN BIASES"

"You're so big on justice, huh? Well, I betcha I could should you a thing or two about the justice the Kraken brings every day!"

[1: Twist vs TRAINER OF JUSTICE

random side note but I think its really funny how back when Brawl dropped I was legit more excited for Pokemon Trainer than I was for Sonic and now Trainer is Only Big Characters

BRO

TWIST JUST SPIKED CHARIZARD DURING FLAME BLITZ

TWIST MY FUCKIGN BELOVED

Brush:

the nature of pokemon trainer is to create inherently fascinating characters with loads of parallels with each other. and toj :D

anyway points once more at crimson and prism both primarily acting through other characters instead of ponying up and fighting with their own power

Which makes TOJ all the funnier

ROUND THREE

We have a report from the field!

"IT WOULD APPEAR THAT JUSTICE IS MORE THAN WHAT IT MAY SEEM AT FIRST!!! WHICH IS WHY I ADORE IT SOOOOOOOOOOOOO"

Transcription:

god: Yes, you have been given a life in which none of your suffering will ever be meaningful or justified. I am asking you to endure it anyway.

me:

god: We both know that you know that I only speak in silences.

me:

god: A thousand faces, all of them Mine.

me: [A thousand faces, [none] of them Mine.]

god: Beloved.

me:

god: I am asking you to endure it.

me:

god: You understand what will happen to you if I look away, don't you? If I blink? I have had to watch every mean and sordid instant of your life, bound within these chains of ardent love. Although you beg me, curse me, and hate me, I will not look away from you. This was the choice I made on your behalf, not My own.

me:

god: No. But I'm close enough to your idea of the real thing that that shuoldn't matter.

me:

god: Time flies straight like an arrow, which is to say it doesn't.

me: [N][arrow][is][the][strai](T][.]

god: I gave you language. You ate the fruit. You will not persuade me not to stay my hand.

me: [I am asking [You] [h][ow] to endure it.]

god: On the strength of My having asked it of you.

me: [I am asking [not] to endure it.]

god: Scio, sweetheart.

"Mhm."

"So here's how it works"

"Imagine I'm opening up MS Paint"

"I close my eyes"

"And I randomly select a color"

"And I put a little dot on the screen"

"Now, I don't know what color that dot is."

"But let's say I guess"

Raven:

"WE'RE BACK IN THE NONARY GAME BITCHES"

"What if I had the power to always be correct, no matter what I said"

"If I guessed green, it would always end up being green. If I said red, it would always end up being red"

"Does this mean that having this sort of power gives you the ability to change the events of the past?"

Janet:

"those events were never known, there's nothing to change"

"So long as there's enough obscurity involved that your statements can't be proven otherwise?"

"Or let's say you can predict that a crystal will hydr........actually wait...bad example"

Janet:

"The point is that the world we live in is based upon the observation of others around us"

END OF PART 1

Part 2

BEGIN CUTSCENE

It surrounded him like a mist.

It felt like a plague of eyes watching him.

It was indescribable. Impossible to even understand.

But from what he could understand....from what information he had been given.....he could come to a firm conclusion.

It was Spectrum.

Captain Quadratic had learned to ignore the strange feeling of a mist that clouded his mind sometimes. He still continued his daily life whenever the mist cleared from his head, but for some reason it felt....emptier? Not because he wasn't truly who he knew he was...it just felt....incomplete for whatever reason.

But he felt the mist again. He'd been waiting for days and there it was again. At this point in time, the mist was welcoming, but it entering his mind and leaving it at sudden points in time was just as natural as sleeping and waking up. But now that the mist was here....he knew that something was bound to happen. But where?

He decided to try his luck with his recent romantic partner, who was chatting with the witchy one with the scarf. "HELLO THERE, YOU TWO!! HELLO, TWIST!!! HELLO, MY RIGHT HAND ROBOT!! WHAT AN ADORABLE PET NAME! I JUST CAME UP WITH IT!" It was true! He did!

Rights Sentience initiated their giggle subroutine while motioning towards Twist. "Hello ((-b+sqrt(b^2-4ac))/2a)&&((-b-sqrt(b^2-4ac))/2a)! I was simply partaking in some speculative information collection (known also under alias 'gossip') with Twist here. It is rumored that Cha Cha is-"

Twist broke out laughing before they could finish, both due to the robot's loose lips and out of sheer shock of how they made that sound with their.....speakers? "RS! If you spill the beans that easy, it doesn't make it good gossip!!"

After a short pause, the robotic form nodded. "Confirmed."

Lowering herself down from laughter, Twist looked over to Captain Quadratic. "So what's goin' on with you, CQ? Any juicy gossip you'd like to share on anybody?"

Gossip.

After a search through some memory banks, he found a profile for this concept of gossip, both hearing it from place to place and utilizing the definition given by His Right Hand Robot.

Order had mentioned gossip before, mostly talking about the people in high school that she was jealous of. The memories loaded back

Memories of her talking about how Stephanie thought that just because she was the cheerleader that she was so much better than anyone else.

How Maggie probably has made out with half of the football team since she can't appreciate the pursuit of science

Memories of how that know-it-all in her class thought he was sooooo smart and always one-upped her and how she'd always wanted to take him out back and teach him a lesson, showing him he's not so tough and she'd pin him up against the wall after proving how much better she was and look into his deep and sad, pathetic, green eyes, slowly inching in closer and oh god quadratic delete that delete that did he did he hear that oh whew he's deactivated that would have been embarrassing

"NOT ABOUT ANYONE THAT WE WOULD KNOW ABOUT" He said, not noticing the irony of his statement :)

FUCK! The mist!!!!

For just a brief moment that had already passed, the mist turned into an overbearing air full of technicolor neon needles. SHE was doing something. And it was worse than usual.

"Quadratic? You are reacting quite strangely? Are you injured?" Apparently, that one had quite the reaction on him. He'd felt this pain before back with his fight with Google, but it felt more like a light ticklish sensation.....this one was significantly stronger for some reason, to the point of a sharp pain.

Twist jumped to a start and moved over to Quadratic quickly, a glowing hand approaching. "Oh my gosh, I knew that Doctor Order had weird plans, but seeing that....how much did she know about Spectrum already?"

"YOU......................YOU KNOW ABOUT SPECTRUM?"

Twist nodded. "I.....have a connection with Spectrum. I'm more surprised she knew about Prism."

So she saw it too......."THE........MIST............." Actually, it's called The Script, but I wouldn't expect the brainiac to know that. :)

Another searing pain of technicolor needles jabbed at his body.

"Dear god.....you felt this every time Prism interfered?"

"WASNT.....AS......STRONG...."

After a pause, Twist closed her eyes for a moment, her eyelids and hands glowing purple as the end of her scarf slowly rose up, as if being pulled on a string, her hair lightly fluttered by a wind that cannot be felt.

"Twist? May I request an update?"

She didn't respond, only allowing the wind underneath her to grow in intensity, pulling up the looser parts of her sweater. After a few intense moments, she spoke up, but not to her new acquaintance.

"Sorry about this, you guys. But you know that anti-Prism measure Quad has? I think it's intensified since we're in a dream....and that's...overwhelming him. That's my first guess, but it's the one we're going with for now. So we're gonna have to leave him out of these cutscenes just in case.....I'll try to get ahold of Nelson to update you guys....and Prism?"

Before The Script could be touched, her eyes flew open, revealing a shining purple light beaming out.

"Don't you dare hurt Captain Quadratic"

"üêç JUSTICEüêç WOULDüêç BEüêç BETTERüêç to be takin'üêç PITY ON YOUüêç ,bucko!üêç"

BEGIN CUTSCENE

Yung Papaya looked down to the snake that laid by his side. "Well.....I've got quite a fight ahead of me to wrap this tournament up.....against......snakes?"

His snake....no.....his father....slithered up Papaya's arm. "Not against what you know as Snakes......these are demons...."

".....Demons?"

The snake closed his eyes, giving a look that is as somber as the face of a snake can give. "My history is.....forgotten....both by myself and by time....I do not recall most of the ancient days of slaying demons and freeing their souls......but I do recall my end.......the lord of Snakes.......He has taken Painguin."

Papaya's father slithers back down to the ground, moving in a circle, as if pensively pacing. "The Snake Lord.....I recall seeing his face only for a moment....that is what turned me into what I was....I recall seeing the forked tongue. The scales that overlaid them...the.......the......." his voice trails off. "I.....remember something new, Yung Papaya.....something that will help us......."

The young child stands up slowly, almost in shock. His father had not recalled much of his previous life for the last decades that he had been by Papaya's side! Suddenly having new information! This was enormous! "Oh my god, dad! That's awesome!!!! What do you remember???"

The snake smiled.

"The colors"

BEGIN CUTSCENE

are you busy right now?

A little bit....listening this little brat tell me about My Little Pony. Hey, did you know that there was, like, a REALLY big follower base of that show who were just....adult men?

that is hardly of importance at the moment, and i have a pressing question to ask you, Crimson

They called themselves bronies. Absolutely wild

where did the other Larry come from Crimson?

i felt a connection, where did he come from?

I dunno, I just found the universe that called to me the most. What can I say? I play favorites sometimes

that called to you?

Well not me, but they were calling to SOME godly power. Some idiots decided to try and absorb Spectrum. Not once, but TWICE. It kinda worked the first time, but the second time-

ended with the subject dying? crimson? i know you have been watching.

are you such a fool that you cannot put two and two together?

............uhhhhhhhhhhhh.....is that a rhetorical question?

Okay so I took someone from your universe, it's not like you just so happened to know the Larry of that universe right?

i have to go

OH MY GOD ARE YOU SHITTING ME???????

".....and then Twilight realized, hold on a minute I can just ASK Princess Celestia for four more tickets to the Gra- Whoa! Hey! Crimson! Is that a Snake?"

Crimson froze hearing the question asked, breaking him out of whatever conversation with a void goddess his mind was mired in. "What....did you just say?" He turned around to see a familiar sight. It was another array of colors shining brightly and somehow sticking out from the other overwhelming colors, which signalled the end of another branch of the tourney. But out of this one came.....a snake....had he awoken?

"Oh god,oh god oh god oh god oh fuck oh god he's free :)" the possessed Dantoinette said, panic hidden by a chipper demeanor as the eight approached the portal that had appeared, ready for whatever may come out.

The first thing to exit from the portal was Captain Quadratic, charging out, as if fearing for his life, tripping on the floor and rolling around by the feet of the others. "WHAT IN GODS NAME IS THAT THING????" he shouted as the sight of small serpents began to leak out of the portal. The snakes had found its way into the story. And it had found the source. The epicenter.

And there weren't 10 people that any of them could forward the email to.

Juniper looked up at Crimson with a worried look in her eyes. "Crimbo? What....what is that?"

Crimson closed his eyes, gulping. "That's the Lord of the Snakes. No one knows where he came from. No one knows what he wants. No one knows why he exists. All that they know is that he is mindless.....he is virulent.....he is a force of destruction that none of us are even close to prepared for.....he's the end of everything."

Cobalt nodded softly as he looks over to his brother. "Crimson, get ahold of yourself. There are nine of us....and one of whatever this thing is. I understand that it is a fright, but I believe we can handle it. We MUST handle it."

As if responding to Cobalt's statement, the scene changed. At first it appears to be a cavalcade of countless snakes, most latching themselves to the side of the portal. To estimate the quantity of snakes in the thousands would be a conservative estimate. But other snakes erupted from the portal as makeshift small ropes. One of these ropes found itself wrapped around Cobalt's leg, tugging him to the ground, allowing more snake ropes to more easily restrain him. Shouts of shock echoed across the over stimulating space as Captain Crimson, Spriteman, Folk, Brunette Roxas, and Captain Quadratic were restrained as well.

But, the true horror came when they found out why there were so many snakes latching onto the edges of the portal.

They were dragging something through it.

A hulking, slithering mass, seeming to be made up entirely of millions of snakes, burst out of the portal, creating the form of what looked to be an enormous snake, seemingly stretching the bounds of the portal itself with its consistently slithering, bulking mass, with a pair of divots in the front creating the illusion of a pair of eyes. It let out a guttural roar that shook everyone, restrained or unrestrained.

"Crimson?" Juniper's voice shook as she tried to ask what this devilish beast even was.

"The Lord of Snakes :)"

"....what?"

"I knew it would be time sooner or later and that he would be done with us soon, but I thought that maybe he would at least finish this dream :)"

Crimson looked up at Prism in shock. Crimson knew about the Lord of Snakes, but what did Prism know? "Prism?? How the hell do you know about this guy?"

Dantoinette looks back at Crimson with....tears in her eyes.

"This is something I've tried to put off, but it was bound to happen :)"

Of course. "What??? Are you telling me???"

"Yes :) The story you've been told is another abstraction :) This will eat our universe as suddenly as it will swiftly :) And it's simply out of our control, no matter how hard I tried to keep it away :)"

Juniper swings her axe at a snake rope coming in. "What does she mean, Crimson?"

Crimson turns his hat to the side dramatically as he gives a long sigh. These are probably his final moments. He better make them count.

"Kid....CPU Kerfuffle might just be over." She wouldn't know what that meant. And that wasn't fair for Juniper. But most things are unfair. Especially with the god of balance incapacitated.

That's when he felt it. A snake clenching itself around his goopy leg before he could finish what he had wanted to say. Before he could react, Crimson feels himself flying into the air and careening faster than his mind could register towards the amalgam of snakes.

I watched him be consumed :)

It.......Oh my god....It's just me and Juniper....:)

Juniper is looking up at me right now, scared out of her mind :)

I know that I've made her feel that way.....I know the pain I've caused.... :)

I know how hurt she must be........it reminds me of Crimson.....:)

............I wish that I had one more chance to talk to Crimson :)

So I could tell him I'm sorry :)

Thinking about the pain I've caused him......caused her..... :)

It hurts me......every time.....:)

I just thought......maybe we could keep it going for just a little longer :)

We could have some more fun with Larry.........and Dani.....and Juniper.....Crimson.....:)

But when fear takes over...........I suppose I......went to a darker place :)

If you don't forgive me for this....I understand. :)

But, from the bottom of my heart, I want to say. :)

I'm sorry :)

I'm so....so sorry for everything :)

.................................

...................................................

.....................................................

................................................

Juniper Uppercut watches between axe swings as the rainbow-colored Dantoinette is absorbed by snakes.

She is alone again.

What does she do?

........

She plants her foot in the ground, holding her axe, fresh with the blood of tens of snakes already.

Maybe.......it can work on one big snake.

Juniper closes her eyes, imagining the voice of Alabaster echoing into her head a word of encouragement before her eyes flare open and she charges at the best, leaping axe first into the nightmare amalgam in this strange world, a cry of life blasting out from her.

If only such a spirit would be so effective.

As she makes contact, the snakes envelop her immediately, swarming over her. "No!" She shouts, hoping for someone to hear her, even though no one is there.

"NO!!!!" she repeats as the snakes envelop her form. The last thing she sees before going under completely is the same thing happening to all of her friends from Dantoinette to Crimson to Cobalt. Everyone is being absorbed.

NO!!! she can't say anything, too covered by snakes. All that she has is her despair. It was over.

......no.......... This beast was too powerful. A beast of pure dysfunction. A beast the feeds upon what is incomplete. A beast that feeds upon potential unrealized. Spectrum's creations which do not fully manifest. And it seems that she is next......when she feels a hand grab a hold of hers.......

.............n............yes?..........

The hand yanks Juniper all of a sudden as a newfound sense of vigor flows through her body through this new hand . The thoughts only came back stronger.

Yes......

A shining light seemed to shine from Juniper as she was dragged through the countless mass of snakes, a feeling of power coursing through her veins like she just ate a hundred pixie stix.

Yes!

Suddenly, Juniper is jerked airborne as the hand that holds her jumps high into the sky, taking the young girl with her.

YES!!!!!!

From up above everything, the entire world is still very overwhelming, but the dark and miserable snake colossus stands out like a sore thumb. She can see that she's right on top of it, all it was going to take was a little boost, which the hand that held her was willing to provide, saying exactly what Juniper was thinking.

The sound started as a low hum

And only grew louder

"mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmMMMMMMMMMYYYYYYYYYYYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

With that shout, Juniper goes careening at an unfathomable speed toward the giant snake. She keeps her composure against the blistering wind on her face to lead with the axe.

"YYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!!!"

The collision feels like it's in slow motion.

The axe shines with the light of balance.

The light of tragedy.

The light of treachery.

The light of imagination.

The light of love.

The light of power.

The light of triumph.

The light of laughter.

The light of pride.

The light of beauty.

The light of sorrow.

The light of ideas.

The light of rage.

The light of inspiration.

The light of justice.

The light of Spectrum.

As if a magic spell had been cast, there is a blinding flash of light, and an animalistic roar of pain......and with that.....the beast is no more......

Hah! Haha!!!!! I'm alive!!!!!! :) What the hell just happened?! :)

There were snakes, it was all about to end, but now it's.....not there anymore....? :)

I blacked out for a bit, but- Is that....Painguin? :) ....on the other side of the portal? :)

Wait a minute, is that....that's Trainer of Justice! :)

Did.....did he save us?

Wait....he's.....he's approaching me..... :)

I.....is he......is he offering me forgiveness? :)

I.....I think I'm about to cry :)

He's....pulling something out of his bag.....I can't tell what it is :)

He's holding it over his head, and...is that car batte- OH NO :)

END CUTSCENE

END OF PART 2

Part 3

BEGIN CUTSCENE

Dantoinette stared into the assorted array of colors as the group behind her watching the tourney hosted their discussions surrounding the contestants. :) Dani didn't really have much to say....she had a lot on her mind at the moment, between the encounter with the snakes a while ago and the newly formed lump on her head from a certain heavy auto part. :)

Suddenly a rogue thought appeared in her head :)

"Didn't take you for the type that knew how to apologize, Prism."

"Oh, you heard that? :)"

"Don't really have much of a choice. Y'know, with the whole taking over my body thing."

Well....above all else, I hope you realize I was genuine in what I said. :) I am truly, truly sorry about the pain that I have caused. :)

"Oh believe me, Prism, my heart is moved. You can't see it since, you know, don't have a body, but I'm crying my eyes out over here. It's like you put on Marley and Me. But you wanna know what would do a REALLY good job of showing how sorry you are?"

.....is it g-:)

"GIVING ME MY BODY BACK, PRISM!"

"Prism?"

A voice came from behind Prismatic Dani, speaking almost simultaneously with the voice in her head, almost leading her to not even notice it. :) When she turned around, she saw that it was the rugged dog himself, Folk. :) Now what on earth was he about to chew her out for? :)

"I see that look in your eye, Folk! :) I'm assuming since Therapuppy got some memories back, maybe you did, too? :) You're not too traumatized, are-"

"That ain't what I'm here for, Prism," his voice seemed calm and...almost gentle. :) "I DID get some memories back, but I'm here to pick up where my past self left off. After all, our session had you give me those memories and that was it. I wanna ask YOU some questions"

"I think my situation is pretty simple, Folk. :) I'm the right hand of Spectrum, the God of Creation. :) I was tasked to help create this story that you're living in right now. And I'm going to make certain that your story is the best that it can be :)"

"....and you mentioned this story is ending?"

"Yes :) Yes it is :)"

Folk pondered for a moment, rubbing his chin, before taking a seat on what could be described as a floor in loose terms :). It was invisible to truly give the idea of a multicolored void, but he took a seat anyway, appearing as if he was floating :) "So....you're older than all of us, yeah? Even older than Crimson and Treusey?"

"Yep! I've existed for all time! :) Even before time, predating your lovely lady :)"

"And you remember all of it?"

"Even the parts that....aren't part of our story?"

"Yes, I do :) I am tied to the story that this world was made to create, but I have still lived my entire existence here :)"

"I'm sorry if I'm prying, but...sounds rough, huh? Living an eternity in a world you know is doomed to die?"

Prismatic Dani shifted somewhat uncomfortably, keeping the smile on her face no matter what. "It's not too rough. :) You just take it day by day. :) When I was helping to form everything, I didn't think about the fact it would all end. :) The only thing that was important is that it would make a good story. :)"

"So what was my ending, Prism?"

Spoilers, Dani :)

"If you Sopranos me, I swear to god..."

"A good story, huh?" Folk paused for a moment, tapping his fingers on the invisible floor, creating a silent tapping motion. "So while you were building all of this, did you have an idea for a sort of...ideal state of being? Like, you'd wake up one morning and think 'You know what? I'm happy!'. Did you ever have that?"

Prism nodded enthusiastically :) "It was all very vague since there are plenty of elements that you all like to do outside my control, but it was fantastic! The great evils defeated, perhaps a grand heroic sacrifice, maybe a fun little scene of Squid Jenny asking Vampire Catgirl Tifa out. Everything you'd expect from a happy ending save for a dance party :)"

"....That sounds really great, Prism"

"Thank you :)"

"But that's not what I asked"

"......:)"

"What was your ideal version of the future? Where did you see yourself happy and satisfied with what you had done here?"

Seconds turned into minutes.

"I'm sorry this is taking so long :)"

"No worries."

A few more minutes passed, the smile on Prismatic Dani's face unwavering, but something behind it slowly sinking.

"What about you, Folk? :)"

"Me? Well, I know before everything went down, I always imagined I would settle down, maybe meet someone, and spend my days helping people through all their own problems. Maybe at the end of the day I'd go out on a porch with some peach tea. Watch the sunset. After everything's gone down, including the whole Doctor Order apocalypse fiasco, I guess it's about the same."

"Only difference is...I guess I have someone to share that peach tea with now."

"And you would be happy living such a life? :)"

"I mean, there'd be the occasional roof leak or something, but for the most part...yeah. I think that I'd be happily living my life."

"........I......cannot imagine that sort of life :)"

"I am made to create :)"

"Any future that I see for myself is the future of my own creation :)"

"I don't see.....myself....in my future :)"

".............................I envy you, Folk :)" Tears streamed past her wide smile.

Folk slowly stood up, detecting he'd gotten somewhere, but to press harder might be a bit too much emotional pressure. "Do...you want me to stick around?"

"No thank you :)"

".....alright, just...just remember that despite everything you've done...despite the pain you've caused....despite all the wrongdoings.....and despite the consequences you deserve to face for them....you're still worthy of love, Prism. You deserve to love yourself."

"I don't know how you can say that. :) I almost erased you from existence :). And all so that I could torment the one you love. :)"

Folk began to walk away, turning his head to give a final message before returning to the rest of the group.

"The word 'never' ain't conditional."

END CUTSCENE

Part 4

BEGIN CUTSCENE

"Alright, next!" The shockingly mundane voice of the hydra's head boomed through the hall as a spirit of someone wicked nervously approached his desk.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sOhMmVeNd0M [Pause Menu [Extended] - Mario Strikers Charged OST]

"Um.....wh....where-"

"Name?" The light blue lizard's head asked nonchalantly without looking up from his sudoku puzzle.

He was on admissions today, which wasn't quite as bad as the usual paperwork that ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨ was tasked with today, but...ironically....Sauerkraut ended up being the lucky one today with overseeing eternal torment. Which, honestly, might have been good. He seemed to be in the dumps...well....more than he usually was...so venting out those emotions to the eternally damned might help in a way.

The cursed soul shifted his feet slightly. "U-um.....Richard...........Sibley? Where....am I? Why am I in these chains?"

Jonny didn't even look up from his Sudoku puzzle. How could he? He was so close to figuring out where the hell (no pun intended) to put this 5.

"Yeah, you're in hell. I dunno if you didn't put it together from the fire and brimstone or if you're still in denial about it, but yeah. The big S deemed you not worthy. Not my decision, I just watch over this place. No, there was not some kind of mistake. No, we do not accept games of chess, and even if we did, we have more experience than your brain could fathom, and your defeat is inevitable. Also, we do not accept deals, that's the balance guy's game. And finally, no there are no cute demon girls. Any more questions?"

Richard shook in his ethereal boots at the onslaught of new information he had received. "How....how did I die?"

"OH SHIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

The sudden outburst from the frigid dragon caused the judged spectre to jump. "Wh-what is it?" A look of hope spread across his face. Perhaps there WAS a mistake! Perhaps he wasn't damned to- "THATS where the 5 goes!" the dragon picks up his pencil with his mouth and expertly writes the number "5" in one of the Sudoku squares. Despite using his mouth, he had perfect handwriting.

"Oh yeah, and to answer your question, you were killed in your sleep after you wrote a blatantly racist law that severely restricted the rights of the Inuit population and spread propaganda to dehumanize them. The person who killed you was based." Jonny hit a button at his desk, immediately opening a trapdoor to drop Richard into the depths.

"Next!!!!"

Suddenly, he felt a tugging from his other neck. It was ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨. These kinds of emergency Korioni head meetings were rare, even after the eternity they spent ruling together, so he responded immediately, retreating his head back through the passage behind the desk.

After retracting his head, he found himself in their room, dimly lit with torchlight to give it that rustic look, with the three holes standing in front of them. One leading to admissions, on leading to the office, and one leading to the damnation chamber. ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨ had already retracted his head from the treasury slot as his tugging had called this meeting, and Sauerkraut was still in the damnation chamber.

"Hey, hey, what's goin' on, ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨?"

‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨ responded with his usual bluster. "Greetings, Jonny! I felt this meeting was absolutely integral to truly continue our reign over hell and continue to torment the wretched souls that plague the mortal coil and deliver the punishment they deserve!"

"Nifty, so, like, what's up tho?"

‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨'s head reaches into the corner of the room to grab a scroll. "Well, I am certain you recall a few months ago when Spectrum's emissary arrived at the gates of hell for inspection, yes?"

Of course, how could he forget? She was a pretty pleasant person, had an iconic smile, and she absolutely had the ability to overwrite literally anything that any of them said or thought, but save for that little hiccup, she seemed pretty chill. "Yeah, what about it?"

"Well, after ruminating within my chamber for days upon days, thinking back upon everything that she had said, I believe that-"

"-thaaaaat she was gonna shut us down. Yeah, I know you were kinda worried about that."

A cold mist emanated from ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨'s nostrils. "'Kind of worried?' Jonny, I understand that you are rather lackadaisical by nature, however I would imagine that you would take her statements far more seriously, especially as someone coming directly from Spectrum!"

"...oooohhhhhhhhhh, you don't know? Sorry, I thought it was common knowledge. This one's on me, ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨!"

"On you, what in th-"

"She can't do anything to us. Even if she wanted to. It's outside the jurisdiction of her purpose. She's bound to the narrative, which is something that we sure as hell aren't bound to."

‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨ paused. "Her purpose is the narrative, then?"

Jonny nodded. "Yep, so we're fine. We dipped our heads in a little bit and gave clearance for a single narrative intrusion into our lives under the stipulation that our status quo be unaffected. In fact, I'd wager that right now is that moment. Smile for the camera."

"So then, why did the brightly colored menace threaten to take us down?"

"Pretty sure it was to get a rise out of Sauerkraut."

"Of course...however the source of her potential affinity for cruelty might be tied to the information I had found."

Jonny's attention was caught by this. "Ohoho, really? And what info did you find?"

"The narrative will end soon."

Jonny's attention was lost just as quickly, his mind going back to the numbers that floated around his Sudoku. "Oh, wow, it comes to an end, does it? Next you'll tell me that 2 plus 2 is 4 or that time is cyclical. I really don't see why this couldn't wait until the end of the shift, but to be fair, it's on me for not keeping you informed about Prism's purpose."

Jonny began to slither his way back to admissions, when he heard his other head speak once again "I wonder what it must feel like to hold immortal purpose over something that is definitively finite. Our purpose is to watch over hell. We have found comfort in our purpose. We live to fulfill the purpose. We do so successfully. And because of this we are content." Another pause. "What is the fate of this vestigial appendage of Spectrum? To exist without purpose..... To be forced to exist knowing that your purpose has been fulfilled? What drives one to awaken?"

Jonny stopped before entering. "That's....not really our problem. But she seems pretty good at tormenting people. It might not fit her predetermined purpose so who knows if she would feel any fulfillment from it, but we can check for openings if you really care about her."

"CARE? AS IF I COULD CARE FOR A BEING SUCH AS THIS" ‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨ snapped back almost immediately. As if on cue, the third head of the hydra emerged from its hole.

"Hey guys, sorry I was late, I was getting bullied by one of the souls and I had to structure a tortue chamber bad enough for him to feel true pain, I didn't miss anything, did I?"

‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨‚ï¨, still heated by Jonny's accusation shouted back, holding back slightly as to ensure it wasn't taken personally. "YES YOU DID SAUERKRAUT, YOU MISSED THE ENTIRE CONVERSATION"

"Awwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww"

END

"i suppose it would be pretty tough for a deity to think of the soft domestic kind of life folk dreams of"

"I've been putting it towards what I was made to do :)"

"But that.....isn't something that will be around for much longer :)"

Raven:

"I get what you mean! I spent so long avoiding and putting off thinking of my future, because I was too scared of it. I would have these huge anxiety and depression spirals over it."

Insider2000:

"You'll find something new. Somehow."

".....thank you for the input you all...I will intrude on the story a little less :)"

"....seriously, thank you, you guys. I'll be first in line to kicking her ass, but....still, y'know?"
